all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
But behold, I say unto you, that little children are redeemed from the foundation of the world through mine Only Begotten;
Doctrine and Covenants 29:46
Quote of the Day
"For parents who have children who have strayed, take heart! … Know that the Lord has placed a mortal angel in his or her path."
I. Raymond Egbo | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
